parameters.command:
=# Save downloaded file and resize for platforms
INPUT_FILE="/tmp/input_{{ $json.uuid }}.jpg"
OUTPUT_BASE="{{ $json.outputDir }}/{{ $json.uuid }}"

# Resize for Instagram (1080x1080)
convert "$INPUT_FILE" -resize 1080x1080^ -gravity center -extent 1080x1080 "${OUTPUT_BASE}_instagram.jpg" 2>/dev/null || true

# Resize for Facebook (1200x630)
convert "$INPUT_FILE" -resize 1200x630^ -gravity center -extent 1200x630 "${OUTPUT_BASE}_facebook.jpg" 2>/dev/null || true

# Resize for LinkedIn (1200x628)
convert "$INPUT_FILE" -resize 1200x628^ -gravity center -extent 1200x628 "${OUTPUT_BASE}_linkedin.jpg" 2>/dev/null || true

# Copy original
cp "$INPUT_FILE" "${OUTPUT_BASE}_original.jpg" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "done"
